src:
102秒激情不倫片流出　中村江莉香醉吻人夫事業全停擺
02 Nov 2019, 09:09 by 娛樂組
日本知名部落客中村江莉香2月參加真人秀《突然的Marriage》，與熊田勇太成為假想夫婦，兩人經過30天的婚姻生活後，假戲真作公開交往，她也順勢開設YouTube頻道，經營網路的事業。不過日前她卻在直播中失控，喝醉後和一旁的灰衣男子亂親一通，兩人還吻到出鏡，短短102秒內就親了6次。


中村江莉香在直播中失控，喝醉後和一旁的灰衣男子亂親一通，兩人還吻到出鏡，短短102秒內就親了6次。（翻攝自推特）

從影片中可見到先由中村江莉香主動出擊，男方也非常享受，更數度說出充滿暗示性的話語：「妳這是什麼滑滑的，好滑呀」、「妳的腳好滑哦」，她則春心蕩漾捧著對方的臉，嘴對嘴狂親，讓男子嗨到直說「怎麼辦會愛上耶」。


影片流出後，熊田勇太立即表示兩人早已分手。（翻攝自中村江莉香IG）

事件爆發後，與中村江莉香以結婚為前提交往的熊田勇太，隔日火速開直播切割，表示兩人早已分手，而中村江莉香則是慘遭外界批評：「不會再支持了」、「看不起她」。


中村江莉香發出聲明向眾人致歉，但形象已損毀，對其事業影響至深。（翻攝自中村江莉香IG）

面對各界的謾罵聲， 中村江莉香發文公開謝罪，而且去見已婚男的老婆道歉，解釋當時開直播本來是要聊工作，不料喝醉後卻失去理智，同時她也將所有錯攬在自己身上，強調是自己主動。並希望外界別再肉搜、打擾對方。不過她的個人事業目前已全面暫停。




★鏡週刊關心您：未滿18歲禁止飲酒，飲酒過量害人害己，酒後不開車，安全有保障。

更新時間｜2019.11.02 09:07
text:
102 seconds of passionate film outflow Zhongcun Jiang Lixiang drunk kiss people career full stop
02 Nov 2019, 09:09 by Entertainment Group
Japan’s well-known blogger, Nakamura, has participated in the reality show “Sudden Marriage” in February, and has become an imaginary couple with Kumamoto. After 30 days of marriage, the two have been openly interacting, and she has also opened a YouTube channel. The cause of the road. However, she was out of control in the live broadcast a few days ago. After drunk, she and the gray-haired man on the side of the scene kissed each other. The two kissed the mirror and kissed it six times in just 102 seconds.


Nakamura Jiang Lixiang lost control in the live broadcast. After drunk, he and the gray-clothed man on the side of the chaos kissed each other. The two also kissed the mirror and kissed it 6 times in just 102 seconds. (Reflected by Twitter)

It can be seen from the film that Nakamura Jiang Lixiang took the initiative to attack, and the man also enjoyed it very much. He even said a few words that were full of suggestive words: "What is this slippery, so slippery?" She is holding her face in the heart and screaming at her mouth, letting the man scream and say, "What will happen, I will fall in love with Jesus."


After the film flowed out, Kudada said that the two had already broken up. (Reviewed from Nakamura Jiang Lixiang IG)

After the incident broke out, Kumada Tadashi, who was associated with Nakamura Jiang Lixiang’s marriage, opened the live broadcast every other day, indicating that the two had already broken up, and Nakamura’s Jiang Lixiang was criticized by the outside world: “I will not support it again” and “look down on her”.


Nakamura Jiang Lixiang issued a statement apologizing to everyone, but the image has been damaged and has a profound impact on his career. (Reviewed from Nakamura Jiang Lixiang IG)

In the face of the buzz of all walks of life, Nakamura Jiang Lixiang issued a public pleading guilty, and went to see the married man's wife apologize, explaining that the live broadcast was originally to talk about work, but after losing drunk, but lost reason, and she also squandered everything in her own On the body, the emphasis is on your own initiative. I hope that the outside world will stop searching and disturbing each other. However, her personal career has now been fully suspended.




★ Mirror Weekly cares about you: It is forbidden to drink alcohol under the age of 18, drinking too much harm to others, not driving after drinking, safe and secure.

Update time|2019.11.02 09:07
